query:
UPDATE email_threads
        SET
            inbox_visible = $1,
            is_read = $2,
            latest_inbound_message_ts = $3,
            latest_outbound_message_ts = $4,
            latest_non_spam_message_ts = $5,
            updated_at = NOW()
        WHERE
            id = $6 AND
            link_id = $7
